about_the_game:
WHEN YOU THOUGHT IT'S ALL OVER... A NEW CHAPTER BEGINS! 🐁

After an accident that made you retire from adventuring, you landed a safe job at the Royal Castle as a cook. Upon the Queen's request, you must venture once more.

EXPLORE 3D ENVIRONMENTS - GATHER, FIGHT, INVESTIGATE RUINS, GO FISHING

Walk across small, hand-crafted areas. Gather cooking ingredients and materials for alchemy and upgrades. Fulfill side quests, and learn more about your companions.

18 INTERACTIVE SEX SCENES WITH 12 DIFFERENT CHARACTERS!

Get intimate with your friends! Customize expression, select animation style and speed!

You can also receive 18 nudes via magic crystal communicator!

Features:

  • Skip fights if you only want to enjoy the story

  • 3D RPG-esque adventuring brings a new layer to the narrative

  • Variety of characters of different races, backgrounds, and tropes, including: maid, office lady, shy nerd, stern teacher, troubled smith, gloomy shopkeeper, and more!

  • One-handed controls - most of gameplay mechanics can be operated only with the mouse

content_descriptors.notes:
Features interactive explicit cartoon sex scenes with full nudity, including oral, vaginal, and anal penetration.

Includes themes:
- questionable consent
- submission and dominance
- rough sex
- crime (stealing)
- depression and loss

All fictional characters are over 21 years old.

detailed_description:
What to expect from this game

This is a low-budget game made mostly by one person.

Take a look at the game's Community Hub for known issues and solutions.

If you encounter some bugs/crashes, please let me know on the forums so I can fix them.


Full Controller Support

Use an Xbox-compatible or PlayStation 4/5 controller for the best experience!


About the Game

WHEN YOU THOUGHT IT'S ALL OVER... A NEW CHAPTER BEGINS! 🐁

After an accident that made you retire from adventuring, you landed a safe job at the Royal Castle as a cook. Upon the Queen's request, you must venture once more.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Full Vulkan 1.0 or OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game engine recommendations
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4790 CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Testing device

name: Flavors of Desires

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Full Vulkan 1.0 or OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game engine recommendations
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9300HF
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Development device

short_description: Adult-Only 3D Adventure with JRPG-inspired elements and card-based combat. The end of adventuring is not the end of the journey.
